definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: Types existed in personage's image-building in the novels of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 明清講史小說在人物形象塑造上存在着類型化傾向。

sentences.english: Historical Pinghua has much bearing on the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 講史平話與《三國演義》成書的關係十分密切。

sentences.english: Jiangshi Pinghua in Song and Yuan Dynasty literature has always been considered as the scripts of Jiangshi.
sentences.chinese: 宋元講史平話一直被認爲是講史的話本。

sentences.english: Jiangshi Pinghua in Song and Yuan Dynasty literature has always been considered as the scripts of Jiangshi.
sentences.chinese: 宋元講史平話一直被認爲是講史的話本。

sentences.english: Commercialization of Lecture on history had risen and came to bloom in the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在宋代，商業性講史活動開始出現並日趨興盛。

sentences.english: History-telling is an important genre in Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 講史是我國曆史上的一種重要文學藝術形式。
